name: Tatsuya Harada
content: Tatsuya Harada Tatsuya Harada Doctor of Engineering, Professor Research Center for Advanced Science and Technology The University of Tokyo Team leader at RIKEN AIP Vice director of Research Center for Medical Bigdata at National Institute of Informatics (NII), Japan Japanese page is here. News Sept. 19, 2025. Three papers have been accepted for publication in NeurIPS 2025. May 1, 2025. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICML 2025. Feb. 27, 2025. Two papers have been accepted for publication in CVPR 2025. Jan. 23, 2025. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICLR 2025. Sept. 26, 2024. One paper has been accepted for publication in NeurIPS 2024. July 1, 2024. Three papers have been accepted for publication in ECCV 2024. May 2, 2024. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICML 2024. Mar. 14, 2024. One paper has been accepted for publication in NAACL 2024. Jan. 17, 2024. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICLR 2024. Dec. 16, 2023. Our paper has been accepted for publication in IJCV. Dec. 9, 2023. Two papers have been accepted for publication in AAAI 2024. Sep. 22, 2023. One paper has been accepted for publication in NeurIPS 2023. July. 14, 2023. One paper has been accepted (1 oral) for publication in ICCV 2023. Sep. 15, 2022. One paper has been accepted for publication in NeurIPS 2022. July. 4, 2022. Four papers have been accepted for publication in ECCV 2022. Mar. 3, 2022. Three papers have been accepted for publication in CVPR 2022. Dec. 1, 2021. One paper has been accepted for publication in AAAI 2022. July. 23, 2021. Two papers have been accepted for publication in ICCV 2021. Mar. 4, 2021. Two papers have been accepted for publication in CVPR 2021. Feb. 28, 2021. Two papers have been accepted for publication in ICRA 2021. Jan. 13, 2021. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICLR 2021. Dec. 2, 2020. One paper has been accepted for publication in AAAI 2021. Sep. 26, 2020. One paper has been accepted for publication in NeurIPS 2020. July. 3, 2020. One paper has been accepted (1 spotlight) for publication in ECCV 2020. Feb. 24, 2020. Two papers have been accepted (1 oral, 1 poster) for publication in CVPR 2020. Dec. 20, 2019. One paper has been accepted for publication in ICLR 2020. Nov. 11, 2019. One paper has been accepted for publication in AAAI 2020. July 23, 2019. Three papers have been accepted for publication in ICCV 2019. Feb. 25, 2019. Five papers have been accepted (3 orals, 2 posters) for publication in CVPR 2019. Jul. 3, 2018. Two papers have been accepted for publication in ECCV 2018. Feb. 19, 2018. Five papers have been accepted (1 oral, 3 spotlights, 1 poster) for publication in CVPR 2018. Jan. 31, 2018. Two papers have been accepted for publication in ICLR 2018. Oct. 26, 2017. We got Honorable Mention Open source software Award 2017 for WebDNN at ACM Multimedia 2017. July 17, 2017. Our paper has been accepted for publication in ICCV 2017. May 28, 2017. We have released WebDNN which executes DNN on a modern browser without installing any software. May 25, 2017. My textbook "image recognition (in Japanese)" has been published. May 13, 2017. Our paper has been accepted for publication in ICML 2017. June 26, 2016. We win the VQA challenge (Abstract Scenes) at CVPR 2016, Las Vegas, USA. March 5, 2016. Three papers have been accepted for publication in CVPR 2016. Dec. 10, 2015. Third place in Object Detection (DET) with "external" data, ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Challenge 2015 (ILSVRC2015) Sep. 3, 2015. Our paper has been accepted for publication in ICCV 2015. April 13, 2014. Our paper has been accepted for publication in ICML 2014. Feb. 25, 2014. Two papers have been accepted for publication in CVPR 2014. Projects Visual recognition Machine learning Multimedia learning (vision, natural language, sound, etc.) Causality Intelligent robot Teaching May 31, 2017.
